hero.title: Contact
hero.description: We are here to answer your questions, schedule your free 30-minute consultation, or help you book your hypnotherapy session. Take the first step towards your transformation!

sendMessage.title: Send Us a Message
sendMessage.description: Complete the form for general inquiries, to request your free 30-minute consultation, or to schedule a session. We will respond shortly.

howToSchedule.title: How to Schedule Your Session?
howToSchedule.description: Scheduling your transformation is easy. We offer free 30-minute consultations and full sessions of 1h to 1h30min.
howToSchedule.freeConsultDesc: Ideal for clarifying doubts, discussing your goals, and understanding how hypnotherapy and neurogenesis can help you. No commitment.
howToSchedule.realSessionDesc2: Important: Book your spot with $75. The other $75 is paid on the day of the session, before starting.

askMoreInfoCTA.title: Ask for More Information
askMoreInfoCTA.description: If you have any questions about our services, hypnotherapy, neurogenesis, or how we can help you achieve your goals and overcome fears, don't hesitate to contact us!
